### SCENE 21 – Niha’s Terrace Talk  

_Niha’s house terrace. She’s folding clothes._

**Hero:** Baledu… em set avvatle…  
**Niha:** Nuvvu emi Tharun Bhascker oo Trivikram oo kadhu; ippude start chestunnav kadha… alane untadi.  
**Hero:** Konchem aina confidence undali kadha.  
**Niha:** Em parledhu—ivanni chepukodaniki baguntay. Taruvatha press-conference-lona “Arjun gurinchi cheppandi” ani naku mike icchinappudu…  
**Hero:** Ooooooo aagu, antha dooram vellaku!  
_Both laugh._

**Niha:** Shwetha ela undhi?  
**Arjun:** _(still laughing, nods)_  
**Niha:** Mari **Maya**?  
**Arjun:** Tanake… chala bagundhi.  
**Niha:** Repu edho plan chestunnav anta—Aman cheppadu.  
**Arjun:** Tana birthday repu.  
**Niha:** Aythe plan **ee night**-kada cheyyali.  
**Arjun:** Tanu puttina time **4 p.m.** anta; paiga *Hasta* 2-padam, mana *Mrugasira* tho manchi communication undhi—ikkada *Makaram*, akkada *Midhunam*… deadly idhi!  
**Niha:** _(laughs)_ Velli jathakalu chepko; thanaki telusa, birthday kosam pilichav ani.  
**Arjun:** “Surprise” ani cheppa.  
**Niha:** Yemyndra mee abbalaki—thana birthday-roju “surprise” ante aa matram telidha aa ammayiki? Burra vaadandi ra! **Abaddham** aadadam tappu kadhu; **aadi dorikipovadam** tappu. Abaddham aadithe *atukunnattu* undali.  
**Arjun:** Mee daggara chala nerchukovali, guruji.  
**Niha:** Na saktulu anni daara‐postunna; vichchahla-vidiga vaadesko.  
<!-- end Scene 21 -->
